sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ProductList
    :NewProduct="NewProduct"
    :TopProduct="TopProduct"
    :BestProduct="BestProduct"
  />
</template>

<script>
import ProductList from "@/components/ProductList.vue";

export default {
  name: "ProductPage",
  components: {
    ProductList,
  },

  data() {
    return {
      NewProduct: [
        {
          image: "/assets/img/product/1/5.jpg",
          alt: "",
          price: 20.0,
          name: "Brilliance Bead Alternating",
          star: 0,
          actualPrice: 35.0,
        },
      ],
      TopProduct: [
        {
          image: "/assets/img/product/1/6.jpg",
          alt: "",
          price: 25.0,
          name: "Brilliance Bead Alternating",
          star: 0,
          actualPrice: 40.0,
        },
      ],
      BestProduct: [
        {
          image: "/assets/img/product/1/7.jpg",
          alt: "",
          price: 30.0,
          name: "Brilliance Bead Alternating",
          star: 0,
          actualPrice: 45.0,
        },
      ],
    };
  },

  onMounted() {
    fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products")
      .then((res) => res.json())
      .then((data) => {
        console.log(data);
        this.NewProduct = data.NewProduct;
        this.TopProduct = data.TopProduct;
        this.BestProduct = data.BestProduct;
      })
      .catch((error) => {
        console.error("Error fetching products data:", error);
      });
  },

  methods: {},
};
</script>
